WorkItem.Description: The latest code uses the var type, which is only supported on framework 3.0+. The batch files for the compact framework is still linking to version 2.0, which will not build. I have already updated my own local copy, but just wanted to point it out so it can be updated in the source. Thanks!
WorkItem.Summary: Build scripts for compact framework is out of date

Comments.Message:
Hi,
I have tryed to get the latest version on Master branch and Develop Branch + some previous commits and i have always the same issue while trying to compile in compact framework... Can you please upgrade the source or specify at least witch version should we user for compact framework?
